currentIssues.description: No visible focus indicators on any interactive elements
currentIssues.location: Settings button, Upload Song button, Demo button

currentIssues.description: Chord symbols compete visually with lyrics, creating unclear reading hierarchy
currentIssues.location: Orange chord symbols (Fmaj7, Em7, A7, Dm, C, A#, F) mixed with gray lyrics

currentIssues.description: Gray lyrics text (#6B7280) on black background fails WCAG AA contrast ratio
Inconsistent vertical spacing between lyric lines disrupts reading flow
currentIssues.location: Space between lyrics lines varies unpredictably

currentIssues.description: Header buttons lack visual consistency and clear interactive states
currentIssues.location: Settings and Upload Song buttons have different styles

recommendations.title: Increase lyrics text contrast to WCAG AA
recommendations.description: Change lyrics color from #6B7280 to #E5E7EB for proper contrast ratio

recommendations.title: Implement consistent verse spacing system
recommendations.description: Use consistent spacing between lines (1.5rem) and verses (3rem) for better readability
recommendations.code:
className='space-y-6' /* For line groups */
className='mb-12' /* Between verses */

recommendations.title: Add comprehensive focus management system
recommendations.description: Implement visible focus indicators for all interactive elements with proper keyboard navigation flow

recommendations.title: Create chord positioning system above lyrics
recommendations.description: Position chords consistently above their corresponding lyric syllables with proper alignment
recommendations.code:
/* Chord container */
Fmaj7
All my troubles seemed so far away

recommendations.title: Standardize button design system
recommendations.description: Create consistent button styles with proper hover and active states
recommendations.code: className='px-4 py-2 bg-gray-800 hover:bg-gray-700 active:bg-gray-900 transition-colors duration-200 rounded-md border border-gray-700'
